thread.title: 'I'm sorry you don't know how domestic violence works,' assault victim tells attorney
thread.title_full: 'I'm sorry you don't know how domestic violence works,' assault victim tells attorney

author: Nathan Clark | nclark1@mlive.com
title: 'I'm sorry you don't know how domestic violence works,' assault victim tells attorney
text: Appearing frustrated from being continuously asked why she didn't cut her ties to a man she knew was violent, a woman testifying in court briefly paused from answering questions and offered an apology.
